What I'm best at

My projects

more to come...
Google Calendar Clone

JAVA - Object Oriented Design Patterns

Team project where me and 2 other students developed a fully functional, Java calendar application with a friendly user interface. The calendar is similar to Google Calendar in terms of capabilities. Additional features of reading events from a txt file and scheduling them following availability were also included.

View Code
PORTFOLIO WEBSITE

HTML - CSS - JAVASCRIPT

Website that allows me to show case some of my recent software engineering projects, as well as to introduce myself. It also connects me to people for future projects collaborations.

Computer Simulation Model

Verilog - ModelSim - Computer Architecture

Wrote a program using Verilog and ModelSim that simulates a computer system model, the system implemented supported a custom instruction set Each component of the computer system was implemented both at the behavioral and gate level to provide a better understanding of how a computer works at the architectural level. The project is of 3 parts:

View Code
iOS APP

Swift - Yelp API

iOS app that allows users, particularly basketball players and hobbiest to see who's available to play, at the nearest basketball court. The development of the application is in progress and is estimated to be finished by November 1st 2019.

Arduino Car Robot

C++

  • Designed Arduino Robot that responds to associated phone app via Bluetooth, participating in robot school race of 40 competitors
  • Improved C++ code to get wheels moving, increase speed, change directions easily and avoid various obstacles of the race
  • Won 3rd place with vehicle speed of 1 meter/sec

Work experience

Past and Current Jobs

  • Microsoft


    I am currently working at Microsoft as a product advisor.

    My role is to improve customer knowledge on usage of various products (Office Apps, Windows, Virtual Reality...), and impact the company’s mission to empower every person and organization on the planet to achieve more, by providing world-class customer service.

    I also conduct coding workshops, and help organize and set up community events. I collaborate with business customers and consumers to identify technology solutions that provide best outcome.

    I increased the new Samsung/Microsoft Note 10/10+ preorders significantly and eventually held first place in the entire company for most preorders.

    I was able to obtain the title of Most-Valuable Player of the month only 4 months on the job.

  • Nordstrom Rack


    Gained leadership skills by leading the women's department on the floor a regular basis. I learned how to efficiently merchandise items of the store. I was named number 1 rewarder of the biggest department of the store for the entire year.
